questions.name: Gender
questions.text: Have you or would you participate in the Naked Donut Run?

broken_down_by.name: Total
blurb: The NDR has taken place each semester for decades and is one of several nudity-related events and traditions on campus.

broken_down_by.name: Gender Identity
blurb: The proportion of female respondents who said they have participated in the Naked Donut Run — 3.2% — is over double the proportion of male respondents who said the same.
